Welcome to the Test!

Please stay within the browser window throughout the test, or the test may fail. This test will record your results to share with you as well as participants of openwebgames.com. The results are technical and non-personal, which may be shared with game publishers, browser vendors, and game developers to continue improving the web games platform. You can view a sample of data collected here. You'll also be able to view and save your results when the test is complete.

Rotate your phone to see the
full frame of each demo.
